main_section_header: The Program for Security and Privacy
main_section_description: "They infiltrate. They exploit. AroCrypt locks them out cold."

section2_boxes.section_info: AroCrypt is a sleek, user-friendly app that encrypts and decrypts text, files, and other digital data with rock-solid security. It’s your go-to tool for safeguarding sensitive information.

box1.title: Blazing Fast Encryption
box1.description: AroCrypt is optimized for lightning-speed performance—no waiting, just instant security.

box2.title: Sleek & Intuitive UI
box2.description: Enjoy a modern, user-friendly interface that makes encryption and decryption a breeze.

box3.title: Flexible Encryption
box3.description: Handle files, text, and more—all in one app. AroCrypt adapts to your needs with total flexibility.

features_desc: Unlock the full power of AroCrypt. From file encryption to text protection and hidden secrets in images, we’re here to keep your data safe and sound.

box1.title: File Encryption
box1.desc: Secure your files with strong encryption. Just drag, drop, and protect—your data stays yours.

box2.title: Text Encryption
box2.desc: Type, encrypt, and share safely. AroCrypt makes text encryption effortless and lightning fast.

box3.title: Image Steganography
box3.desc: Hide sensitive files in images effortlessly, protected by automatic encryption.

box4.title: More Features Coming Soon!
box4.desc: Stay tuned for future updates with even more tools to enhance your privacy and flexibility.

encryption_power_desc: AroCrypt is built on industry-standard encryption algorithms, starting with AES-256 — the same technology trusted by banks and governments. Future updates will bring even more advanced cryptographic options, keeping you one step ahead of cyber threats.

box1.title: AES-256 Encryption
box1.desc: AroCrypt leverages AES-256, the Advanced Encryption Standard with a 256-bit key size—the same robust algorithm used by banks, governments, and security experts worldwide. With a virtually unbreakable design, AES-256 ensures your data is safeguarded against unauthorized access, brute-force attacks, and evolving cyber threats.

box2.title: Crack Time Estimate
box2.desc: To put it in perspective: cracking an AES-256 encryption key using a supercomputer capable of one billion (1,000,000,000) key attempts per second would still take approximately 1,157,920,892,373,161,954,235,709,850,086,879,078,532,699,846,656,405,640,394,575,424 years. That’s roughly 10^68 years. In short: it’s not happening.

box3.title: Future-Proof Security
box3.desc: We're not stopping at AES-256. Future versions of AroCrypt will integrate additional encryption algorithms to stay ahead of the curve. Whether it's post-quantum encryption or advanced cryptographic standards, your data will remain secure in a world of evolving technology and threats.

use_cases.section_desc: AroCrypt isn’t just a tool—it’s your digital bodyguard. Whether you’re a developer, business owner, or privacy-conscious user, AroCrypt shields your data in ways you didn’t think possible.

box1.title: Encrypted Messaging
box1.desc: Keep your personal and business chats locked down with military-grade encryption.

box2.title: Secure Cloud Storage
box2.desc: Encrypt your files before they ever leave your device, so you’re in control—always.

box3.title: Password Vault
box3.desc: Keep your passwords locked in an encrypted vault where only you hold the keys.

box4.title: Encrypted File Sharing
box4.desc: Share sensitive files without worry. AroCrypt keeps them safe in transit and at rest.
